items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
items.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.

items.content_html: A lightweight and accessible React accordion component with smooth animations.
items.title: vuhuuu11/react-accordion: A lightweight and accessible React accordion component with smooth animations.

items.content_html: RiftJS: A lightweight Node.js wrapper for the Riot Games API, providing easy access to League of Legends game data.
items.title: Jonatansilx/RiftJS: RiftJS: A lightweight Node.js wrapper for the Riot Games API, providing easy access to League of Legends game data.

items.content_html: Script Runner is a lightweight tool that runs scheduled API calls using a cron job. It supports nohup for background execution, with the API URL and schedule set via environment variables.
items.title: preetiGusain/script_runner: Script Runner is a lightweight tool that runs scheduled API calls using a cron job. It supports nohup for background execution, with the API URL and schedule set via environment variables.

items.content_html: A highly customizable and lightweight QR code generator for React applications.
items.title: LGLabGreg/react-qr-code: A highly customizable and lightweight QR code generator for React applications.

items.content_html: LOCKDOWN (Log Obfuscation & Console Kill-switch with Devtools Override Warning Network) - Lightweight JavaScript library to secure your website by blocking DevTools access, disabling context menu, shortcuts, text copy/cut/select, and more. Built for front-end security hardening.
items.title: wprimadi/lockdown: LOCKDOWN (Log Obfuscation & Console Kill-switch with Devtools Override Warning Network) - Lightweight JavaScript library to secure your website by blocking DevTools access, disabling context menu, shortcuts, text copy/cut/select, and more. Built for front-end security hardening.

items.content_html: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.
items.title: ChandanJain009/nodejs-nano-service: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.

items.title: kiki-kanri/node-ciphers: Lightweight AES and DES encryption library for Node.js, featuring flexible encoding, multiple cipher modes, and TypeScript support.

items.content_html: Lightweight, high-performance seamless scrolling component with support for React and Vue frameworks.轻量级、高性能的无缝滚动组件，支持React和Vue框架。

items.content_html: 🛡️ B.A.R.R.I.C.A.D.E (Bot Activity Recognition & Reputation-based Inspection for Client-side Anomaly Detection & Evaluation) – A lightweight JavaScript library for detecting bots, headless browsers, and automation tools in real-time, directly from the browser.
items.title: wprimadi/barricade: 🛡️ B.A.R.R.I.C.A.D.E (Bot Activity Recognition & Reputation-based Inspection for Client-side Anomaly Detection & Evaluation) – A lightweight JavaScript library for detecting bots, headless browsers, and automation tools in real-time, directly from the browser.

items.content_html: This is a lightweight module for implementing remote asynchronous function calls (RPC) between different scripts using various transports, like WebSockets. It allows calling functions on a remote API and routing responses with minimal configuration.
items.title: xjsdev/iorpc: This is a lightweight module for implementing remote asynchronous function calls (RPC) between different scripts using various transports, like WebSockets. It allows calling functions on a remote API and routing responses with minimal configuration.

items.content_html: A lightweight, zero‑dependency JavaScript library to spotlight DOM elements with a customizable overlay, border, padding, and optional tooltip. Single or multiple elements can be highlighted, using usual selectors.
items.title: graphieros/target-highlight: A lightweight, zero‑dependency JavaScript library to spotlight DOM elements with a customizable overlay, border, padding, and optional tooltip. Single or multiple elements can be highlighted, using usual selectors.

items.content_html: 1. Uses Node.js with Puppeteer and Chromium to scrape a user-specified URL. 2. Uses Python (with a lightweight web framework like Flask) to host the scraped content. 3. Demonstrates the combined power of Node.js for browser automation and Python for serving content, while keeping the final image lean.
items.title: SyedAsad777/webscraper-devops: 1. Uses Node.js with Puppeteer and Chromium to scrape a user-specified URL.  2. Uses Python (with a lightweight web framework like Flask) to host the scraped  content.  3. Demonstrates the combined power of Node.js for browser automation and Python  for serving content, while keeping the final image lean.
